intro_about_me: Welcome to my website! I’m honored that you’ve taken the time to visit. My name is Nicha Kaewrod, and I have 4 years and 10 months of experience as a Full-Stack Developer. I specialize in PHP, Node.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and MySQL for web development, and I have also worked with React Native and Flutter for mobile app development. I'm flexible and always up for learning new stuff.
phrase_intro: To rise above others, one must strive harder than the average person.
